comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Firefox/4.0

In firefox 4, if we are playing a youtube video, then the video is visible in another open window. 

Pre-requisites: Firefox 4 opened with another window, say notepad.

Reproducible: Sometimes

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open any youtube video.
2. After some time (1-2 minutes), open notepad window. 
Actual Results:  
The youtube video is visible on top left corner of notepad.

Expected Results:  
The video should not be playing in any other windows.

The bug is not re-producible each time. Sometimes when we open any other window after the video starts playing, the video is visible. But, in some cases, you may need to switch between firefox and notepad 3-4 times.
